alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:52PM CDT until July 21 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 351 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Rosston, or 15 miles north of McNeil, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rosston, Willisville, Bodcaw, Cale, Mount Moriah, Young, Morris, Waterloo and Falcon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
